column4: Hey, I have some r01, r02, r03 etc... files that I want to unpack. I don't seem to be able to do that with the inbuilt archive unpacker. How do I do it?
for par2 files sudo apt-get install par2
par2 only works on the cli afaIk
ok, is par2 the name for the filecompression method?
par2 repairs rars , they are often send with rar files on usenet but work also on other files
sorry, im a beginner linux user. cli afaik?
unrar on the CLI : unrar e <blah.rar>
hey again. I just discovered that there's something wrong with r16. How do I repair it with par2repair ?
not sure... I ain't got anyfiles named par2 that I want to unpack
well, I used unrar e filename /file/directory. And it worked. But now I get an read error on file r16
